com.github.nwillc.opa.transaction

Class Memento<K,T extends HasKey<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nwillc.opa.transaction.Memento<K,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type on the entities
    T - type of the entities
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transaction, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteMemento, SaveMemento, UpdateMemento

    public class Memento<K,T extends HasKey<K>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transaction
    A memento is designed to be enough context information of a persistence activity to undo it at a later time.
    Since:
    0.3.0
